description: Allows user to easily set up domain using Entri
variableDescription: ip is the ip to point the domain and domain is the domain to be pointed
syncRedirectDomain: api.goentri.com, goentri.com, entri.com, app.entri.com,app.goentri.com, Host is to where domain is pointed
variableDescription: ip is the ip to point the domain, aHost is whe A record is pointed, cnameHost is the host for the CNAME record and cnamePointsTo is where the CNAME is pointed
